products.title: Hive Plain White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive plain white perfect fit pleated blind px71001. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal properties and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hiveplain white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Hive Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive blackout white perfect fit pleated blind px72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive blackout white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Blackout FR White Duo Thermal Blind
products.metadescription: Perfect fit hive blackout fr white duo thermal blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: Hive blackout fr. With an additional coating to help prevent the spread of and accidental flame, fire retardant blinds can really put your mind at ease, creating a much safer environment for you and your family.

products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Blackout White Duo Thermal Blind
products.metadescription: Perfect fit hive blackout white duo thermal blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: Use hive blackout when you need extra light control in addition to the thermal insulation qualities hive offers.

products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Plain White Duo Thermal Blind
products.metadescription: Perfect fit hive plain white duo thermal blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: Hive blinds have a unique honeycomb structure, which not only offer light control but are also energy saving. They can regulate room temperature by helping to reduce heat loss in winter and help keep rooms cool in summer.
